author: Buster Ecks
comment: Nice easy to use app, but you can't stack triggers. In other words you can choose a time of day, but you can't choose a time of day AND location.  That's a huge fault for me. I want an action to happen at a certain time only when I'm at a certain location. This surprises me. Because other similar. Apps allow for this stacking of triggers as well as actions.

author: Sindre Stordahl
comment: Can't trust it. Some triggers work, others do not. For example location triggers are unstable, work like 1 out of 10 times. The whole point of automation is that you can trust the task being automated!

author: Sebastián Hernández
comment: The app does what it says, it automates some actions. I'm having problems with half of the triggers since they do not work. Very useful for timing rules, but not for location rules or weather rules.

author: Tom S
comment: So far this app is fantastic. I've tried Tasker, Trigger and IFTTT and they just sometimes didn't work... So far this one has been great... Great features. Love the wifi option features for vibrate at work or sound when home. Great app.

author: Jrz Cat
comment: Once I made sure the rules I set up had no redundancy or conflicting logic, which took a bit of planning and figuring out and experimentation with command types, this app worked and still works like a charm, including the location triggers. It helped that I used location triggers for my Bluetooth on/off and time triggers for Wi-Fi.  Big thumbs up. Was happy to pay a couple of bucks for the r,tra commands. Happy camper. Thank you so much! I hope you get a stipend from Samsung/the competition for making their products more tolerable and useful!

author: jeff c.
comment: Most of the useful actions I read about in the documentation are missing from my app install. I've reviewed the website and documentation as much as I can and cannot find any explanation for why my instance is missing these.

author: Tony Su
comment: after changing phones all the unlocked features and rules I made disappeared with apparently no way to recognise that I am the same user
For anybody that can't get the volume actions working make sure your using the appropriate 1, it took me awhile to.

author: Rob Mick
comment: For simple tasks, this is the app to download. It outdid my expectations.

author: A Google User
comment: Doesn't work on Xiaomi MI5 with Android 7.0. I tried different rules, but none was triggered

author: Sooraj s das
comment: This app doesn't work when we try to activate sound related rules! This happening in Android N.

author: Steven Reichart
comment: I like this app but sometimes I don't like it . It has times where it does not work . But it seems to work properly when it does function . I would love to give you five stars for working properly all the time as soon as it does I will .

author: Michael Hanser
comment: It worked very well on my Samsung phone. Now it doesn't work on my Huawei phone.. Please fix it.
It used to work ok, but i installed in a BLU VIVO 8, with android 7, and it does the timing triggers, the problem is after startup, if i dont open the app, it wont startup automatically

author: Feinard Ss
comment: This app is amazing except when you started an app there's not any action for enable gps.like trigger maps action enable gps and action airplane off.

author: Craig Williams
comment: Bluetooth volume actions do not work.

author: Omer Bar
comment: For some unkown reason the app won't change the wifi on/off state on my HTC m8... There is no admin premissions for the app....

author: Dan Laskowski
comment: Takes over your phone. Not good.
can anyone tell me how to restore rules because i have to restore the rules but it is not working

author: Jason H
comment: Exactly what i was looking for. So simple to use. All the right triggers and actions. Just seems to work so far.

author: Ambati Sai Kalyan
comment: The best automation app less ram usage and really quick 10/10 😘

author: Kevin Pinto
comment: User friendly & nice app for creating tasks for mobile.
Doesn't show option to shut down device

author: Rafael Bento
comment: Understandable and beautyful hud simple and well executed idea

author: 문형호
comment: Excellent. No need to root.

author: Stephen Perry
comment: It's good.

author: Radu Vulcu
comment: Best app

author: shannon healey
comment: One rule should be able to trigger multiple events...  Ie on charge doable data,  change screen brightness and volume all at once.  Making different types of rles for each of these is a hassle.  In installed to find better app

author: shonsu34
comment: ** UPDATE ** Testing all done!  Works as a great replacement for my old solution (abandonware).  Worth the $2.99 for the pro version.  ----------------------- Testing as a replacement for another scheduling app that's now abandon wear.  So far so good.  One issue so far with a volume change not working just right. Will keep watching it to see if it was a fluke.  If it settles down I'll purchase the full version.

author: kodiak
comment: Used to work great, but now I have to reboot my phone to stop a sound from continuously playing on receiving txt with certain words.. Please fix. Developers have ignored numerous emails

author: Stefanie McLeod
comment: I used to have Timerific but it stopped working after years of use, so I downloaded this app. It's a bit of work to set everything up, since you have to create a rule for each action (Timerific had profiles with multiple actions).   Lately I've noticed that it doesn't always launch the rules, though. I also set a rule for the phone ringer and text notifications to be on zero sound when I'm at work, but that sets it to vibrate instead of silent, which means I need to manually change it to silent...kind of making the app redundant to me. Not sure if I'll keep.

author: Mukul Handa
comment: Doesn't stay active on AndroidColor OS no matter what. Hope developer can give admin rights to this app!!

author: Man Pang
comment: I am not easily impressed but this app is class. I do have a gripe in that having created a manual rule to set display sleep time to never, the Android display settings shows 30 minutes! Nevertheless, the plethora of uses this offers is simply quite staggering!

author: Joe S
comment: Just installed app.  Had problem with app executing rules. Emailed support, no response, so gave 2 stars.  Not very reassuring.

author: Nomi A
comment: Love this app, was going to upgrade to pro but if what another user (Deborah. s) who did it said is true, than I'll just stick to the free version.

author: Mark Webb
comment: Android GS4 shut down rule doesn't work.

author: J Brooks
comment: Loved this app until last update. Now it no longer triggers any rules.

author: Sanjay Sachdev
comment: Some functions are missing like if i launch an app,should have option to turn on the Data function under the Action settings, but now its missing.

author: Dimo Dimov
comment: The one reason I downloaded the app was to start the music player when my phone connects to a bluetooth headset or my car. It works great

author: Tony Nicolas
comment: Best app in the market place. Does what you want it to do. And exactly that. You can download rules from other users or create your own. Bloomington marvelous.
